## R Basics

Swirl is a great and easy way to get you started with R. Install and open it by clicking the green arrow on the right.

Install Swirl Package:
```{r Swirl, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("swirl")
library("swirl")
swirl()
```

Once you enter your username, it prompts you to choose a course to install.
Choose 1 for "R Programming" to learn the basics. 
Then, enter 1 again and it will take you to a menu of courses you can choose from.
